SELECT common_no , academy_id , member_type_id , common_nickname , common_title , to_char(common_register_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as common_register_date , common_readcnt , common_block_confirm , common_thumb , common_file FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(tb_common_board PK_TB_COMMON_BOARD) */ rownum as rnum , common_no , academy_id , member_type_id , common_nickname , common_title , common_register_date , common_readcnt , common_block_confirm , common_thumb , common_file FROM tb_common_board WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND common_no >= 20000 AND common_no < 30000 AND ( ( common_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) OR ( common_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) OR ( common_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) ) AND academy_id = #{academyId} ) WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1 ) * #{amount}
